page.title: 16AN ELDERLY PERSON
page.content: Mrs.Constance Gostello has lived in {Chiswell Green}for 50 years and has seen many changes. Her husband died two years ago and since then,she has been without transport. She uses the local shops twice a week because the buses are not reliable and the fare has become increasingly expensive. A visit to St.Albans only takes place when her daughter or a neighbour gives her a lift. Mrs.Gostello uses the mobile library which parks in the shopping area once a week and is a member of the Townswomens Guild. The Guild meets monthly in the Church hall and has a variety of speakers on subjects ranging from cake making to mountain climbing.Mrs Gostello enjoys acting in the Guild's drama group who perform twice a year for the Over Sixties Club as well as their own members.
